author: intrepid42
body:
#### PR description:

* Added ghost tau ancestors to identify electrons/muons from tau decays.

#### PR validation:

Tested, tau ghosts increase number of constituents and show up in the `tags` collection.

#### Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26616 (merged) but without the fixes for Rivet 2.7.x.
title: Add tau ghosts for dressed leptons (10_2_X)
